snippet: A deal involving Bank of America that came to light recently shows how bank bailouts have continued, even if in a much quieter form than in the depths of the financial crisis.
abstract: Gretchen Morgenson Fair Game column observes that secret deal between Federal Reserve Bank of New York and Bank of America that has come to light shows how bank bailouts have continued, even if in much quieter form than in depths of financial crisis; contends that details of undisclosed settlement over mortgage-backed securities are remarkable.
lead_paragraph: A deal involving Bank of America that came to light recently shows how bank bailouts have continued, even if in a much quieter form than in the depths of the financial crisis.

headline.seo: Don’t Blink, or You’ll Miss Another Bank Bailout
